subject: Aw: A shipment from order #SSN5258 is on the way
description_text:
Dear Team, 
 
 according to the tracking the package should have arrived. The only thing I got was a small parcel with 2 mounting brackets, no haptic motors, can you please clarify? 
 
 See also screenshot, package only had 0.12kg. 
 
 Thanks 
 Timo 
 
 
 
 Gesendet: Dienstag, 30. Dezember 2025 um 13:19 
 Von: SIMSONN <service@simsonn.com> 
 An: timo.lamm@gmx.de 
 Betreff: A shipment from order #SSN5258 is on the way

 One item in your order is on the way. Track your shipment to see the delivery status.

 DHL Express tracking number: CE326638195DE 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Items in this shipment 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Simsonn Plus X Racing Simulation Pedal with Haptic Reactor Optional × 1 Plus X P3-H3 / Silver / Baseplate Part of: Simsonn Plus X Racing Simulation Pedal with Haptic Reactor Optional 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 If you have any questions, reply to this email or contact us at service@simsonn.com

conversations.body_text: Hi Timo Lamm,  I can see that your order includes PlusX pedals and VAM Pro haptic motors, which were shipped in two separate packages. Could you please confirm which tracking number corresponds to the package you have already received? Also, please take photos of everything you have received so far. I will help you check whether any items are missing or if the second package is still in transit.

Hello, 
 
 belongs to SF6047201468555 which arrived according to the delivery - as you can see in my screenshot, last mile was done by PostNL with only 0.12kg of weight - see picture attached this was all 
 
 Thanks 
 Timo 
 
 Regards 
 Timo 
 
 
 Gesendet: Mittwoch, 7. Januar 2026 um 09:40
Hi Timo Lamm,    Haptics is included in your DHL tracking number, shipped from the German warehouse.  CE326638195DE
